name: @thi.ng/transducers
description: Lightweight transducer implementations for ES6 / TypeScript
author: Karsten Schmidt <k+npm@thi.ng>

scripts.test: yarn run clean && tsc -p test && mocha build/test/*.js
scripts.clean: rm -rf *.js *.d.ts build doc func iter rfn xform
scripts.pub: yarn run build && (cd build && yarn publish --access public)
